First, I need to find out how many birds were killed by the hunter. Since the hunter killed 25% of the birds, I can calculate 25% of 20.

25% of 20 is calculated as (25/100) * 20 = 5 birds.

So, 5 birds were killed.

Now, to find out how many birds are left on the tree, I subtract the number of birds killed from the total number of birds initially on the tree.

20 - 5 = 15 birds.
